/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, divided by a concrete median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings and power lines on either side. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the urban environment.
